Package soot.jimple.infoflow.river

Interface IUsageContextProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyUsageContextProvider
    public interface IUsageContextProvider
    Provides the analysis whether usage context is needed
    Author:
    Tim Lange

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isStatementWithAdditionalInformation​(soot.jimple.Stmt stmt, Abstraction abs)
      Whether the flow reaching the statement should be recorded.
      Set<AdditionalFlowInfoSpecification> needsAdditionalInformation​(soot.jimple.Stmt stmt, Set<Abstraction> taints)
      Provide an access path that should be queried as an additional flow.

    • Method Detail

      • needsAdditionalInformation

        Set<AdditionalFlowInfoSpecification> needsAdditionalInformation​(soot.jimple.Stmt stmt,
                                                                Set<Abstraction> taints)
        Provide an access path that should be queried as an additional flow.
        Parameters:
        stmt - current statement in the analysis
        taints - outgoing taints in the analysis
        Returns:
        Flow specifications if a usage context shall be computed. Always non-null.

      • isStatementWithAdditionalInformation

        boolean isStatementWithAdditionalInformation​(soot.jimple.Stmt stmt,
                                             Abstraction abs)
        Whether the flow reaching the statement should be recorded.
        Parameters:
        stmt - current statement in the analysis
        abs - incoming taint in the analysis
        Returns:
        true if the flow should be recorded
